mapper.select: SELECT L.LIST_NO AS listNo, L.MEM_NO AS memNo, L.HOL_TYPE AS holType, L.AFTERNOON_OFF AS afternoonOff, TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS "start", TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'yyyy-MM-dd')) AS "end", L.HOL_COUNT AS holCount, (M.MEM_NAME || ' ' || DECODE(L.AFTERNOON_OFF,'A','반차','연차')) AS title FROM HOLIDAY_LIST L INNER JOIN MEMBER M ON L.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO
